welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ostrava, a charming city known for its rich industrial history and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore our unique architecture, delicious local cuisine, and friendly atmosphere. Enjoy your time in our beautiful city!

restaurants.name: HogoFogo Bistro
restaurants.description: HogoFogo Bistro is a modern european restaurant located in Ostrava.
